reviewText: This appeared to be the cast's first shot at doing any kind of acting. The script could have been written by a 9 year old. The audio sounded like in my bathroom, and the score was too loud. I give it one more star because it kept my 6& 7 yr old kids' attention.

You can tell that most of the actors are new at their job, but I think the story line was very funny.  An adopted girl is treating her  new family horribly so her adoptive sister and relative (who are witches) teach her a lesson by planning to turn her into an animal. They tried several different ones, but she ends up a cat. It is crazy after that.  I enjoyed it.
